act_info.full_title: Interim Appropriation for 2023-2024 Act, 2022, S.O. 2022, c. 23, Sched. 4

content.content: 1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.
content.raw_html: 1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.

content.content: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $174,400,946,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $174,400,946,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,026,116,100 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,026,116,100 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $298,190,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024, amounts not exceeding a total of $298,190,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024. 6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  Français
content.raw_html:
5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2024.

6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

 

Français
